name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draft Hero Live Sync for Fantasy Football

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your 2024 Fantasy Football League settings and draft picks with Draft Hero

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Draft Hero Live Sync extension for MFL, Yahoo, ESPN, CBS, NFL.com, FFPC, Underdog and Sleeper leagues.

Draft Hero is live and ready for the 2024 fantasy football season. Stay tuned for added site sync features.

v8.1.0: Added draft sync for Underdog Best Ball contests.

Automatically import league settings and draft picks in real-time from live fantasy football drafts for personalized pick-by-pick fantasy advice.

It takes a few clicks to add this extension to your browser, one click to remove it, and your fantasy football experience will never be better!
